sections.background: Assumes that the data to be compressed consists of N tuples or data vectors taken from k dimensions. Principal component analysis and search to obtain c “k-dimensional” orthogonal vectors that best represent the data, where c≤k. In this way, the original data can be projected into a smaller space to achieve data compression
